messages.content: ComfyUI_GLM4Node is a project that integrates the vision understanding function of GLM4, one of the most powerful Chinese LLMs, into ComfyUI.
What are the three main functions of ComfyUI_GLM4Node?
The three main functions of ComfyUI_GLM4Node are GLM4 Vision Integration, GLM4 Chat, and GLM3_turbo Chat.
How can users upload images for processing in ComfyUI_GLM4Node?
Users can upload images for processing in ComfyUI_GLM4Node via a public URL due to the slow transmission rate of base64 in GLM4.
What is the purpose of uploading images via URL in ComfyUI_GLM4Node?
Uploading images via URL in ComfyUI_GLM4Node enhances the user experience and processing speed when using the GLM4 vision function.
How can users ensure their API key works properly in ComfyUI_GLM4Node?
Users need to upload their API key to the node and make sure it is working properly before using the functions in ComfyUI_GLM4Node.
What is the command to install zhipuai?
The command to install zhipuai is `pip install zhipuai`.
What should users do if they find any bugs or have suggestions for ComfyUI_GLM4Node?
If users find any bugs or have suggestions for ComfyUI_GLM4Node, they can open an issue or a pull request or contact the developer at jcandzero@163.com.
